flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The DNA of a space virus underwent ansudden mutation upon exposure to anlaser beam and resulted in DEOXYS.fThe crystalline organ on this POKéMON’snchest appears to be its brain.
DEOXYS emerged from a virus that camenfrom space. It is highly intelligent andnwields psychokinetic powers.fThis POKéMON shoots lasers from thencrystalline organ on its chest.
A POKéMON that mutated from annextraterrestrial virus exposed to a lasernbeam. Its body is configured for superiornagility and speed.
This DEOXYS has transformed into itsnaggressive guise. It can fool enemies bynaltering its appearance.
When it changes form, an aurora appears.nIt absorbs attacks by altering itsncellular structure.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
DNA from a space virus mutated andnbecame a Pokémon. It appearsnwhere auroras are seen.
DNA from a space virus mutated andnbecame a Pokémon. It appearsnwhere auroras are seen.
Il vient d’un virus extraterrestrenarrivé avec une météorite et ayantnsubi une mutation génétique.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
Il vient d’un virus extraterrestrenarrivé avec une météorite et ayantnsubi une mutation génétique.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
An alien virus that fell to earthnon a meteor underwent a DNAnmutation to become this Pokémon.
いんせきに　ふちゃくしていたnうちゅうウイルスの　ＤＮＡがnへんいして　うまれた　ポケモン。
운석에 붙어 있던n우주 바이러스의 DNA가n변이하여 생겨난 포켓몬이다.
Il vient d’un virus extraterrestre arrivé avec unenmétéorite et ayant subi une mutation génétique.
Ein außerirdischer Virus kam mit einem Meteor aufndie Erde. Seine DNA mutierte. So entstand Deoxys.
Surgió a raíz de la mutación de ADN de un virusnalienígena que cayó a la Tierra en un meteorito.
È il risultato della mutazione genetica di un virusnalieno giunto con un meteorite.
An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteornunderwent a DNA mutation to becomenthis Pokémon.
隕石に　付着していたn宇宙ウイルスの　ＤＮＡがn変異して　生まれた　ポケモン。
うちゅうウィルスが　とつぜんへんいをnおこして　ポケモンに　なった。nオーロラの　ちかくに　あらわれる。
우주 바이러스가 돌연변이를n일으켜 포켓몬이 되었다.n오로라 근처에 나타난다.
C’est un virus extraterrestre qui a muté en Pokémon.nIl apparaît à proximité des aurores boréales.
Deoxys ist ein außerirdisches Virus, das zu einemnPokémon mutierte. Es erscheint in der Nähe vonnAuroras.
Pokémon surgido a raíz de la mutación de un virusnalienígena. Aparece cerca de la aurora.
Una mutazione di virus alieni ha portato alla creazionendi questo Pokémon. Visibile in prossimità dell’aurora.
DNA from a space virus mutated and became anPokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
宇宙ウィルスが　突然変異をn起こして　ポケモンに　なった。nオーロラの　近くに　現れる。
レーザーを　あびた　うちゅうウィルスの　ＤＮＡがnとつぜんへんいを　おこして　うまれた　ポケモン。nむねの　すいしょうたいが　のうみそ　らしい。
레이저를 쬔 우주 바이러스의 DNA가n돌연변이를 일으켜 태어난 포켓몬이다.n가슴의 수정체가 뇌인 것 같다.

L’ADN d’un virus extraterrestre entama une mutationnnon attendue suite à une exposition à un rayon laser,nce qui créa Deoxys. L’organe cristallin se trouvantnsur la poitrine de ce Pokémon semble être son cerveau.

Die DNS eines Weltraumvirus hat eine spontane Mutationnerfahren, da sie einem Laserstrahl ausgesetzt wurde.nDaraus entstand Deoxys. Das kristallartige Organ aufnder Brust dieses Pokémon ist sein Gehirn.
Tras estar expuesto a un rayo láser, el ADN de un virusnespacial sufrió una mutación y dio origen a Deoxys. Segúnnparece, el órgano cristalino que este Pokémon tiene en elntorso es el cerebro.

Il DNA di un virus spaziale ha subito un’improvvisa mutazione,nin seguito all’esposizione a un raggio laser. Questo handato vita a Deoxys. Pare che l’organo cristallino sul suo pettoncostituisca il cervello.
The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation uponnexposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys.nThe crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to benits brain.
レーザーを　浴びた　宇宙ウィルスの　ＤＮＡがn突然変異を　起こして　生まれた　ポケモン。n胸の　水晶体が　脳みそ　らしい。
うちゅうウィルスから　たんじょうした　ポケモン。nちのうが　たかく　ちょうのうりょくを　あやつる。nむねの　すいしょうたいから　レーザーを　だす。
우주 바이러스에서 태어난 포켓몬이다.n지능이 높고 초능력을 쓸 수 있다.n가슴의 수정체에서 레이저를 쏜다.

Deoxys était à l’origine un virus provenant de l’espace. Il estnextrêmement intelligent et dispose de pouvoirs télékinétiques.nCe Pokémon envoie des lasers avec l’organe cristallin situénsur sa poitrine.

Deoxys ging aus einem Virus aus dem Weltraum hervor.nEs ist sehr intelligent und nutzt psychokinetische Energie.nDieses Pokémon verschießt Laserstrahlen aus einemnkristallartigen Organ auf seinem Brustkorb.
Deoxys surgió a partir de un virus espacial. Tiene un alto nivelnintelectual y poderes psicoquinéticos. Este Pokémon disparanrayos láser por el órgano cristalino que tiene en el torso.
Deoxys è nato da un virus proveniente dallo spazio. È dotatondi estrema intelligenza e di poteri psicocinetici. Spara ragginlaser dall’organo cristallino del proprio corpo.
Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highlynintelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémonnshoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
宇宙ウィルスから　誕生した　ポケモン。n知能が　高く　超能力を　操る。n胸の　水晶体から　レーザーを　出す。

form_descriptions.description: Forms have different stats and can learn different moves.  Moves are retained through form changes.nnIn Generation III, Deoxys's form depends on the game: Normal Forme in Ruby and Sapphire, Attack Forme in FireRed, Defense Forme in LeafGreen, and Speed Forme in Emerald.  In subsequent games, every form exists.  Meteorites for switching Deoxys's form can be found in the following locations, depending on the game:nn  Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum: In the southwest corner of veilstone city.n  HeartGold and SoulSilver: At the west end of kanto route 3, near pewter city.n  Black and White 1 & 2: In the museum in nacrene city, there is a single meteorite on display which cycles between all forms.
